analysis.key_quote: Federal employees are not political appointees and shouldn't be. This policy would result in the wholesale emptying out of the federal government every 4-8 years, the opposite of government efficiency.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the Schedule F rule, emphasizing the need for federal employees to maintain their nonpartisan status and protections from political influence. It raises concerns about the loss of institutional knowledge and the negative impact on government efficiency.
